com.penthera.virtuososdk

Class Common.BackplaneSettingFlag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.Common.BackplaneSettingFlag
  • Enclosing class:
    Common
    public static final class Common.BackplaneSettingFlag extends java.lang.Object
    Flags for determining which backplane settings have been modified in the Observers.IEngineObserver.backplaneSettingChanged(int) callback.
    • Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      RESERVED_FLAG 
      static int RESERVED_FLAG
      value = 0x800000; Flag for reserved rules.
      public static final int RESERVED_FLAG
      value = 0x800000; Flag for reserved rules.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values
      SETTING_ALL 
      static int SETTING_ALL
      Flag for all settings.
      public static final int SETTING_ALL
      Flag for all settings. Passed to the backplaneSettingChanged callback of IEngineObserver when all setting values have been modified.
      See Also:
      Observers.IEngineObserver.backplaneSettingChanged(int), Constant Field Values
      SETTING_DEVICE_DOWNLOAD_ENABLED 
      static int SETTING_DEVICE_DOWNLOAD_ENABLED
      value = 0x20; Flag Download Enabled device setting.
      public static final int SETTING_DEVICE_DOWNLOAD_ENABLED
      value = 0x20; Flag Download Enabled device setting. Passed to the backplaneSettingChanged callback of IEngineObserver when its value has been modified. This setting is managed by the Backplane. Clients can request a change to their download enablement through the IBackplane.changeDownloadEnablement(boolean).
      See Also:
      IBackplane, IBackplaneSettings.getDownloadEnabled(), Observers.IEngineObserver.backplaneSettingChanged(int), Constant Field Values
      SETTING_EAD 
      static int SETTING_EAD
      value = 0x08; Flag for the Expiry After Download window.
      public static final int SETTING_EAD
      value = 0x08; Flag for the Expiry After Download window. Passed to the backplaneSettingChanged callback of IEngineObserver when its value has been modified. Clients cannot modify the Expiry After Download value. The Backplane manages this value and transmits it to the SDK during a sync. However, clients can set the Expiry After Download window on individual assets through the IAsset interface.
      See Also:
      IBackplaneSettings.getExpiryAfterDownload(), IAsset.getEad(), IAsset.setEad(long), Observers.IEngineObserver.backplaneSettingChanged(int), Constant Field Values
      SETTING_EAP 
      static int SETTING_EAP
      value = 0x04; Flag for the Expiry After Play window.
      public static final int SETTING_EAP
      value = 0x04; Flag for the Expiry After Play window. Passed to the backplaneSettingChanged callback of IEngineObserver when its value has been modified. Clients cannot modify the Expiry After Play value. The Backplane manages this value and transmits it to the SDK during a sync. However, clients can set the Expiry After Play window on individual assets through the IAsset interface.
      See Also:
      IBackplaneSettings.getExpiryAfterPlay(), IAsset.getEap(), IAsset.setEap(long), Observers.IEngineObserver.backplaneSettingChanged(int), Constant Field Values

      public static final int SETTING_MDD

      public static final int SETTING_MOFF
